response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Our product has been meticulously designed and developed to provide unparalleled benefits, ensuring satisfaction and efficiency in its application. Given its unique features and the dedication we've put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than its face value. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, we're offering the product for an exclusive price of $15,000. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive support package that will ensure its successful integration into your operations. We're confident that this investment will pay off in terms of productivity gains and cost savings. Should you decide to proceed, we'll work closely with you to ensure a smooth transaction and delivery. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a long-term partnership. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 15000}
